column1: # id: unique identifier | tag_prefix: component tag | name: component name | type: category | subtype: symbol name | isa_code: instrument code | default_properties: JSON of default specs | default_width_px: symbol width (px) | default_height_px: symbol height (px) | port_definitions: JSON of connection points (mm) | placement_rule: how placed on pipe | cost_usd: estimated cost | manufacturer: supplier name | efficiency_pct: efficiency (%)
